solution.text:
Rs. _{{51100*j}}_
\(\Rightarrow\)Total cost of ticket = No of kilometres travelled \(\times\) price per km
\(\Rightarrow\)Price per km = (100\(\times\)_{{j/3}}_) Rs.
\(\Rightarrow\)Therefore total cost of ticket = (1533)\(\times\)(100\(\times\)_{{j/3}}_)
\(\Rightarrow\)Total cost of ticket= _{{51100*j}}_

content.text: A plane ticket costs _{{100*j}}_ Rs per every 3 Km travelled. Aman goes from Pune to Delhi which is at a distance of 1533 Km. how much does his plane ticket cost Aman? Think about whether this amount justifies the travel
